com.google.gwt.maps.client.overlay
Interface HasCircle

All Superinterfaces:
HasJso, HasMVCObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
Circle
public interface HasCircle
extends HasMVCObject

A circle on the Earth's surface; also known as a "spherical cap". This class extends MVCObject.

Author:
vinay.sekhri@gmail.com (Vinay Sekhri)
